full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================InMillis

### Title

**FTA (Food, Cooking, Baking and Serving Equipment) - Request for Proposal**

### Reference Number

PW-22-01010673

### Publication Date

2022-10-20

### Tender Closing Date

2022-11-21T14:00:00

### Description

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the procurement and delivery of various food equipment. The requirements are as follows:

* Item 1: 20 Automatic Coffee Makers to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 2: 15 Automatic Coffee Makers to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Item 3: 12 Electric Ranges to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 4: 8 Electric Ranges to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Item 5: 4 Steam Cookers to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 6: 3 Steam Cookers to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* Item 7: 1 Mechanically Cooled Bulk Milk Dispenser to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
* Item 8: 2 Baking and Roasting Deck Ovens to be delivered to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

**Submission Requirements**

Bidders are required to submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will not be considered. A preference is given to Canadian goods and/or services.

**Notice**

The requirement is subject to a Request for Proposal (RFP) and is open to all qualified suppliers. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Attachments**

Please refer to the attachments below for the detailed instructions and specifications for this tender:

* [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/20/2d3434be1f86b5f0476ad2de786207de/w8482-230901_-_english_rfp.pdf)
* [French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/20/8dd1ff0336de8907ce91e865d76a2064/w8482-230901_-_french_rfp.pdf)

### Tender Status

This tender has ended.
